page.title: 11Farming
page.content: The scale of recent changes in farming practices is evident countrywide.The most conspicuous of those that have affected the Lindean area may be summarised thus:1.Two dairy herds have been sold.2.Many farm workers have been replaced by travelling contractors.3.Rotational cropping has been abandoned in favour of winter barley.4.A small estate has been dismantled and partly sold in small lots.5.A local "smiddy" no longer exists.6.A local joiner's workshop is now a house.7.A local corn mill has gone out of business and has been converted to use as a glass factory and house.8.Outlandish breeds of cattle and sheep have to some extent displaced traditional breeds. 9.Artificial fertilisers and chemical sprays are now commonplace.
